page.title: 14Bean: A New Quarry Proposed
page.content: { }Blue Circle Industries own land and mineral rights in the Bean and Darenth Wood area. They have applied for planning permission to quarry at Darenth Woods and lately on the site of the Mabledon Hospital, which is adjacent to the woods to the west. Local people are very much opposed to the scheme and to date permission has been refused. The manufacturers claim that modern quarrying methods allow restoration to follow closely behind extraction. Washed out quarries can be used as nature reserves or sites for industry. Alternatively they can be filled in with household refuse. When full, top soil is spread over the area which is then ready for agriculture or recreation purposes.
